nodes.text: Dominaire was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. He managed the gladiatorial Arena Grand, which he claimed was the greatest source of entertainment in all of the Eternal Empire. In 3630 BBY he booked a fight for the Mysterious Stranger, who would go on to become the Eternal Champion of the Arena.
Dominaire appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the NPC on Zakuul who starts the "Eternal Championship". He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
